• Doom Bots receive bonus stats per level and have overpowered abilities
  • Veigar summons 1 curse at a time throughout the game
  • Survive for 15 minutes and then face Doom-boss Veigar himself
  • Earn Gold and Dragon Souls for completing missions during the game

• Doom Bots receive bonus stats per level and have overpowered abilities
  • Veigar summons 2 curses at a time throughout the game
  • Survive for 15 minutes and then face Doom-boss Veigar himself
  • Earn gold and Dragon Souls for completing missions during the game

In addition to Doom Bots' regular features:
  • Difficulty is harder than base Doom Bots
  • The level cap is raised to 30 for both teams
  • Doom Bots receive 200% experience from all sources
  • New Prismatic item for purchase: “Veigar's Talisman of Ascension” that increases XP and has a hidden reward!

In addition to Doom Bots' regular features:
  • Difficulty is significantly harder than base Doom Bots
  • Doom Bots receive Veigar's passive, Phenomenal Evil
  • Players receive bonus Item Haste
  • Curses stack (i.e. new Curses are activated, old Curses are never removed)
  • New Prismatic item for purchase: Demon King's Crown

In addition to Doom Bots' regular features:
  • Difficulty is equivalent to 'DOOM!'
  • The game Timer is set to 5 minutes (instead of 15)
  • If the Timer runs out before 15 minutes of game time has elapsed, Veigar instantly wins!
  • Each kill of a Doom Bot by a player adds 15 seconds of time
  • Doom Bot stats are altered to make them more susceptible to damage
  • New Prismatic item for purchase: Gambler's Blade
Trials of Doom Difficulty - Veigar's Curse!
Trials of Doom Difficulty - Veigar's Evil!
Trials of Doom Difficulty - Veigar's Doom!

Doom-boss Veigar is the greatest Evil to ever strike at the hearts of Runeterra - and he's only getting bigger! Striking an enemy Champion with a spell or scoring a takedown grants Doom-boss Veigar permanently increased Ability Power.
Amumu's basic attacks <font color='#9b0f5f'>Curse</font> his enemies, causing them to take bonus true damage from incoming magic damage.
Blitzcrank gains a shield based on their mana when dropping to low health.

Doom-boss Veigar is the greatest Evil to ever strike at the hearts of Runeterra - and he's only getting bigger! Striking an enemy Champion with a spell or scoring a takedown grants Doom-boss Veigar permanently increased Ability Power.

Doom-boss Veigar is the greatest Evil to ever strike at the hearts of Runeterra - and he's only getting bigger! Striking an enemy Champion with a spell or scoring a takedown grants Doom-boss Veigar permanently increased Ability Power.

Brand's spells light his targets ablaze, dealing damage over 4 seconds, stacking up to 3 times. If Brand kills an enemy while it is ablaze he regains mana. When Blaze reaches max stacks on a Champion or large monster, it becomes unstable. It detonates in 2 seconds, applying spell effects and dealing massive damage in an area around the victim.

Every few basic attacks, or against a target she has trapped or netted, Caitlyn will fire a headshot dealing bonus damage that scales with her critical strike chance. On trapped or netted targets, Caitlyn's Headshot attack range is doubled.
Whenever Cho'Gath kills a unit, he recovers Health and Mana. The values restored increase with Cho'Gath's level.
A percentage of Corki's basic attack damage is dealt as bonus <trueDamage>true damage</trueDamage>.
Every third strike cleaves nearby enemies for an additional magic damage. After casting a spell, Diana gains Attack Speed for 5 seconds.
Jinx receives massively increased Move Speed and Attack Speed whenever she helps kill or destroy an enemy champions epic jungle monster, or structure.
After Lee Sin uses an ability, his next 2 basic attacks gain Attack Speed and return Energy.
Lux's damaging spells charge the target with energy for a few seconds. Lux's next attack ignites the energy, dealing bonus magic damage (depending on Lux's level) to the target.
When he hasn't recently taken damage or been crowd controlled, Malzahar gains massive damage reduction and crowd control immunity, lingering for a short period after taking damage.
Maokai's basic attack also heals him and deals additional damage on a moderate cooldown. Each time Maokai casts a spell or is struck by an enemy's spell, this cooldown is reduced.
When Nami's Abilities hit allied champions they gain Move Speed for a short duration.
Nautilus' first Attack against a target deals increased physical damage and roots them briefly.
Soraka runs faster towards nearby low health allies.
Increases Tristana's Attack Range as she levels.
Urgot's basic attacks and Purge periodically trigger blasts of flame from his legs, dealing physical damage.
Wukong gains stacking armor and max health regeneration while fighting champions and monsters.
Xerath's basic attacks periodically restore Mana. Whenever Xerath kills a unit, this cooldown is reduced.
Overcome by anguish, nearby enemies lose a percentage of their maximum Health each second and have their <font color='#9b0f5f'>Curses</font> refreshed.
Amumu tosses a sticky bandage at a target, stunning and damaging the target while he pulls himself to them.
Amumu entangles surrounding enemy units in bandages, applying his <keywordMajor>Curse</keywordMajor>, damaging and stunning them.
Permanently reduces the physical damage Amumu would take. Amumu can unleash his rage, dealing damage to surrounding enemies. Each time Amumu is hit, the cooldown on Tantrum is reduced.
Blitzcrank super charges themself to get dramatically increased Move and Attack Speed. They are temporarily slowed after the effect ends.
Blitzcrank charges up their fist to make the next attack deal double damage and pop their target up in the air.
Blitzcrank fires their right hand to grab an opponent on its path, dealing damage and dragging it back to them.

Enemies attacked by Blitzcrank are marked and take lightning damage after 1 second. Additionally, Blitzcrank can activate this ability to remove nearby enemies' shields, damage them, and silence them briefly.
Blasts target enemy champion, dealing a large amount of magic damage, increasing based on the target's missing health.
Doom-boss Veigar unleashes a bolt of dark energy that deals magic damage to the first two enemies hit. Units killed by this bolt grant Doom-boss Veigar some ability power permanently.
Mordekaiser pulls all enemies in an area.
Mordekaiser pulls all enemies in an area.
Doom-boss Veigar unleashes a bolt of dark energy that deals magic damage to the first two enemies hit. Units killed by this bolt grant Doom-boss Veigar some ability power permanently.
Doom-boss Veigar unleashes a bolt of dark energy that deals magic damage to the first two enemies hit. Units killed by this bolt grant Doom-boss Veigar some ability power permanently.
Doom-boss Veigar calls a great mass of dark matter to fall from the sky to the target location, dealing magic damage when it lands. Stacks of Phenomenal Evil reduce Dark Matter's cooldown.
Doom-boss Veigar twists the edges of space, creating a cage that Stuns enemies that pass through.
Mordekaiser drags his victim to a different dimension with him and steals a portion of their stats. If he kills them, he keeps the stats until the victim respawns.
Blasts target enemy champion, dealing a large amount of magic damage, increasing based on the target's missing health.
Blasts target enemy champion, dealing a large amount of magic damage, increasing based on the target's missing health.
Brand conjures a powerful blast at his target that spreads to nearby enemies, dealing magic damage. If the target is ablaze, Conflagration's spread is doubled.
Brand launches a ball of fire forward that deals magic damage. If the target is ablaze, Sear will stun the target.

Brand unleashes a devastating torrent of fire that bounces up to 5 times off of Brand and nearby enemies, dealing magic damage to enemies each time bounce. Bounces prioritize stacking Blaze to max on Champions. If a target is ablaze, Pyroclasm will briefly slow them.
After a short delay, Brand creates a Pillar of Flame at a target area, dealing magic damage to enemy units within the area. Units that are ablaze take an additional 25% damage.
Caitlyn fires a heavy net to slow her target. The recoil knocks Caitlyn back.
Caitlyn revs up her rifle for 1 second to unleash a penetrating shot that deals physical damage (deals less damage to subsequent targets).
Caitlyn takes time to line up the perfect shot, dealing massive damage to a single target at a huge range. Enemy champions can intercept the bullet for their ally.
Caitlyn sets a trap that, when sprung, reveals and immobilizes the enemy champion for 1.5 seconds, granting Caitlyn an empowered Headshot.
Devours an enemy unit, dealing a high amount of true damage. If the target is killed, Cho'Gath grows, gaining maximum Health.
Cho'Gath unleashes a terrible scream at enemies in a cone, dealing magic damage and Silencing enemies for a few seconds.
Ruptures the ground at target location, popping enemy units into the air, dealing damage and slowing them.
Cho'Gath's attacks release deadly spikes, dealing damage and slowing all enemy units in front of him.
Corki flies a short distance, dropping bombs that create a trail of fire that damages opponents who remain in it.
Corki's gatling gun rapidly fires in a cone in front of him, dealing damage and reducing enemy Armor and Magic Resist.

Corki fires a missile toward his target location that explodes on impact, dealing damage to enemies in an area. Corki stores missiles over time, up to a maximum. Every 3rd missile fired will be a Big One, dealing extra damage.
Corki fires a flash bomb at a target location, dealing magic damage to enemies in the area. This attack additionally reveals units in the area for a duration.

Diana creates three orbiting spheres that detonate on contact with enemies to deal damage in an area. She also gains a temporary shield that absorbs damage. If her third sphere detonates, the shield gains additional strength.

Unleashes a bolt of lunar energy in an arc dealing magic damage.

Afflicts enemies struck with Moonlight, revealing them if they are not stealthed for 3 seconds.

Diana reveals and draws in all nearby enemies and slows them.

If Diana pulls in one or more enemy champions, the moonlight crashes down onto her after a short delay, dealing magic damage in an area around her, increased for each target beyond the first pulled.

Becomes the living embodiment of the vengeful moon, dashing to an enemy and dealing magic damage.

Lunar Rush has no cooldown when used to dash to an enemy afflicted with Moonlight. All other enemies will have the Moonlight debuff removed regardless of whether they were the target of Lunar Rush.
Jinx throws out a line of snare grenades that explode after 5 seconds, lighting enemies on fire. Flame Chompers will bite enemy champions who walk over them, rooting them in place.

Jinx modifies her basic attacks by swapping between Pow-Pow, her minigun and Fishbones, her rocket launcher. Attacks with Pow-Pow grant Attack Speed, while attacks with Fishbones deal area of effect damage, gain increased range, but drain Mana and attack slower.

Jinx fires a super rocket across the map that gains damage as it travels. The rocket will explode upon colliding with an enemy champion, dealing damage to it and surrounding enemies based on their missing Health.
Jinx uses Zapper, her shock pistol, to fire a blast that deals damage to the first enemy hit, slowing and revealing it.

Tempest: Lee Sin smashes the ground, sending out a shockwave that deals magic damage and reveals enemy units hit. If Tempest hits an enemy, Lee Sin can cast cripple.
Cripple: Lee Sin cripples nearby enemies damaged by Tempest, reducing their Move Speed. Move Speed recovers gradually over the duration.

Sonic Wave: Lee Sin projects a discordant wave of sound to locate his enemies, dealing physical damage to the first enemy it encounters. If Sonic Wave hits, Lee Sin can cast Resonating Strike for the next 3 seconds.
Resonating Strike: Lee Sin dashes to the enemy hit by Sonic Wave, dealing physical damage based on the target's missing Health.

Lee Sin performs a powerful roundhouse kick launching his target back, dealing physical damage to the target and any enemies they collide with. Enemies the target collides with are knocked into the air for a short duration. This technique was taught to him by Jesse Perring, although Lee Sin does not kick players off the map.

Safeguard: Lee Sin rushes to target ally, shielding himself from damage. If the ally is a champion, they are also shielded. After using Safeguard, Lee Sin can cast Iron Will.
Iron Will: Lee Sin's intense training allows him to thrive in battle. Lee Sin gains Life Steal and Spell Vamp.
Lux releases a sphere of light that binds and deals damage to up to two enemy units.
Fires an anomaly of twisted light to an area, which slows nearby enemies. Lux can detonate it to damage enemies in the area of effect.
Lux throws her wand and bends the light around any friendly target it touches, protecting them from enemy damage.
After gathering energy, Lux fires a beam of light that deals damage to all targets in the area. In addition, triggers Lux's passive ability and refreshes the Illumination debuff duration.

Malzahar infects his target's mind with cruel visions of their demise, dealing damage over time. Using Malzahar's other spells on the target will refresh the visions.

If the target dies while afflicted by the visions, they pass on to a nearby enemy unit and Malzahar gains Mana. Malzahar's Voidlings are attracted to affected units.
Malzahar opens up two portals to the Void. After a short delay, they fire projectiles that deal Magic Damage and silence enemy champions.
Malzahar channels the essence of the Void to suppress an enemy champion over a zone of damaging negative energy.
Malzahar summons Voidlings to attack nearby enemies.
Malzahar summons Voidlings to attack nearby enemies.
Maokai flings a sapling to the target area to stand guard. More effective in brush.
Maokai knocks back nearby enemies with a shockwave, dealing magic damage and slowing them.
Maokai summons a colossal wall of brambles and thorns that slowly advances forwards, damaging and rooting any enemies in the path.
Maokai contorts into a mass of moving roots, becoming untargetable and dashing to the target. Upon arrival, he roots the target.
Empowers an allied champion for a short duration. The ally's basic attacks and spells deal bonus magic damage and slow the target.
Sends a bubble to a target area, dealing damage and stunning all enemies on impact.
Summons a massive Tidal Wave that knocks up, slows, and damages enemies. Allies hit gain double the effect of Surging Tides.
Unleashes a stream of water that bounces back and forth between allied and enemy champions, healing allies and damaging enemies.
Nautilus hurls his anchor forward.  Colliding with an enemy pulls them and Nautilus together, dealing magic damage.  Colliding with terrain pulls Nautilus towards it.

Nautilus fires a shockwave into the earth that chases an opponent. This shockwave rips up the earth above it, knocking enemies into the air. When it reaches the opponent, the shockwave erupts, knocking his target into the air and stunning them.
Nautilus gains a temporary Shield.  While it persists, his Attacks deal damage over time to his target and surrounding enemies.
Nautilus creates three exploding waves around himself. Each explosion damages and slows enemies.
Creates a zone at a location that silences all enemies inside. When the zone expires, all enemies still inside are rooted.
A star falls from the sky at the target location dealing magic damage and slowing enemies. If an enemy champion is hit by Starcall, Soraka recovers Health.
Soraka fills her allies with hope, instantly restoring health to herself and all allied champions.
Soraka sacrifices a portion of her own health to heal another friendly champion.

When Tristana kills a unit, her cannonballs burst into shrapnel, dealing damage to surrounding enemies. Can be activated to place a bomb on a target enemy that explodes after a short duration dealing damage to surrounding units.
Tristana fires her weapon rapidly, increasing her Attack Speed for a short time.

Tristana loads a massive cannonball into her weapon and fires it at an enemy unit. This deals Magic Damage and knocks the target back. If the target is carrying the Explosive Charge bomb, the bomb detonation radius is doubled.
Tristana fires at the ground to propel her to a distant location, dealing damage and slowing surrounding units for a brief period where she lands.
Urgot charges in a direction, shielding himself and trampling non-champion enemies. If he catches an enemy champion, he will stop and hurl them out of his way.
Fires an explosive charge at the target location, dealing physical damage and slowing enemies caught in the explosion.
Urgot fires a chem-drill that impales the first enemy champion hit. If that champion falls below a health threshold, Urgot judges them weak and can execute them.
Urgot slows himself while he unloads his weapon on nearby enemies. Prioritizes enemy champions Urgot has recently struck with other abilities and triggers Echoing Flames.
Wukong becomes <font color='#91d7ee'>Invisible</font> and dashes in a direction, leaving behind a clone that will attack nearby enemies.
Wukong becomes <font color='#91d7ee'>Invisible</font> and dashes in a direction, leaving behind a clone that will attack nearby enemies.
Wukong's next attack gains attack range, deals bonus damage, and reduces the target's armor for a few seconds.
Wukong dashes to a targeted enemy and sends out images to attack enemies near his target, dealing damage to each enemy struck.

Wukong's extends his staff and spins it around repeatedly, gaining Move Speed.

Enemies struck take damage and are knocked up.

Wukong's extends his staff and spins it around repeatedly, gaining Move Speed.

Enemies struck take damage and are knocked up.
Calls down a barrage of arcane energy, slowing and dealing magic damage to all enemies in an area. Targets in the middle receive additional damage and a stronger slow.
Fires a long-range beam of energy, dealing magic damage to all targets hit.
Xerath immobilizes himself and gains numerous long-range barrages.
Deals magic damage to an enemy and stuns them.

The Sad Mummy of DoomIn addition to bonus stats, Doom Bot Amumu also:
  • Shares his Despair with nearby minions
  • Taunts enemies with Tantrum
  • Has a larger Curse of the Sad Mummy
It's been a while, but he's still quite sad.
Destroy Karthus' Life Crystal and Defeat Karthus!
Kill Mega-Ziggs before he destroys all the buildings in one of your lanes!
Find the real Fiddlesticks before time runs out!
Destroy the Gravesites before the Ghouls wreck your base!
Hold the arena in the center of the map for longer than the Doom Bots!
Destroy Veigar's three Super Evil Portals before they spawn powerful enemies!
Deal more damage to your Target Dummy than the Doom Bots do to theirs!
Protect the Shield on the Tower in the Middle Lane from the Doom Bots!
Destroy the pumpkins before Veigar finishes powering up the Doom Bot!
Kill Singed before he makes it back to the relative safety of the Chaos base.

The Witch's Cauldron of DoomIn addition to bonus stats, Doom Bot Blitzcrank also:
  • Fires a slower Rocket Grab!
  • Stuns himself with Overdrive!
  • Launches his target behind him with Power Fist
  • Zaps nearby enemies with Static Field
... Did we leave anything out?
You've done enough damage to draw Veigar's attention, it might be time to RUN!

The Burning Vengeance of DoomIn addition to bonus stats, Doom Bot Brand also:
  • Has a piercing Sear
  • Creates multiple Pillars of Flame in cardinal directions
  • Is a 3-Star %i:3StarEnabled% Brand, causing his ultimate to bounce 20 times
Meaner and more on fire than ever.

The Sheriff of DoomIn addition to bonus stats, Doom Bot Caitlyn also:
  • Has increased auto attack range
  • Ricochets Piltover Peacemaker to a nearby champion if it hits a target
  • Places Yordle Snap Traps that hone in on enemies
  • Chains Ace in the Hole to nearby enemies, block it at your own peril!
Will stop you from "getting to the choppa" at any cost.
Veigar and his Doom Bots are stronger now

Doom of the VoidIn addition to bonus stats, Doom Bot Cho'gath also:
  • Stomps the ground very hard, creating 3 Ruptures
  • Feral Screams in a wider area
  • Sends Vorpal Spikes further based on his size
  • Passively gains Feast stacks
His appetite is satiated! ... Just kidding, he's still hungry.

The Daring Bombardier of DoomIn addition to bonus stats, Doom Bot Corki also:
  • Fires 3 Phosphorus Bombs in a row
  • Regains a missile if he connects one
  • Prepared a special BIG ONE!
Something something 42?

<titleLeft>Giant Blinding Darts</titleLeft><mainText>CURSED! Veigar asked Teemo to fire giant darts at you.</mainText>
<titleLeft>Corrupted Lamb's Respite</titleLeft><mainText>CURSED! All living things find a respite from death in this zone!</mainText>
<titleLeft>Mirror Image</titleLeft><mainText>CURSED! The Doom Bots have Mirror Image!</mainText>
<titleLeft>Polymorph Zone</titleLeft><mainText>CURSED! Zones of Lulu's Polymorph magic are appearing around the map!</mainText>
<titleLeft>Realm Warp</titleLeft><mainText>CURSED! Ryze's Realm Warp will teleport you towards the Doom Bots!</mainText>

Not so big now!
You have become smaller and have reduced health... but you have gained movement speed, attack speed and ability haste.

Tiny TimeCURSED! Is this a short joke?
Killing minions will shrink you!
<titleLeft>Tornado Chaser</titleLeft><mainText>CURSED! This Tornado will hunt you down.</mainText>
<titleLeft>Event Horizon</titleLeft><mainText>CURSED! Veigar is casting Event Horizon at you!</mainText>
<titleLeft>Event Horizon & Dark Matter</titleLeft><mainText>CURSED! Veigar is casting Event Horizon and Dark Matter at you!</mainText>
Dark MatterCURSED! Veigar is casting Dark Matter at you!
<titleLeft>Baleful Strike</titleLeft><mainText>CURSED! Veigar is casting Baleful Strike at you!</mainText>
<titleLeft>Crescent Guard</titleLeft><mainText>CURSED! The Doom Bots are impervious to damage dealt from outside this circle.</mainText>

Doom of the MoonIn addition to bonus stats, Doom Bot Diana also:
  • Harnesses the power of moon and sun in Crescent Strike
  • Pale Cascade also casts eclipse when the orbs all connect
  • Moonfall also calls down the sun
Is very good friends with Leona! They were roommates!
This is my side of the map! Go away!

Loose Cannon of DoomIn addition to bonus stats, Doom Bot Jinx also:
  • Improves Pow-Pow and Fishbones per ability rank
  • Chains ZAP! to nearby enemies
  • Throws out FLAME CHOMPERS! that flame, chomp, and move!
  • Unleashes a SUPER MEGA DEATHROCKET! that causes mayhem
Is such a jinx... Hey that's where her name comes from!
<titleLeft>King of the Hill Bonus</titleLeft><mainText>Bonus Adaptive Force for the bots.</mainText><postScriptLeft>Source: King Of The Hill</postScriptLeft>

Blind Monk of DoomIn addition to bonus stats, Doom Bot Lee Sin also:
  • Throws a Sonic Wave that explodes and marks multiple targets
  • Jumps to multiple targets with Resonating Strike
  • Slams the ground harder, creating a larger Tempest
You'll never see him coming. And neither will he.

Lady of Luminosity of DoomIn addition to bonus stats, Doom Bot Lux also:
  • Creates a starbursts of Light Bindings
  • Detonates her Lucent Singularity multiple times
  • Fires multiple Final Sparks in a circle
She doesn't have dark secrets... she has bright ones!

The Prophet of DoomIn addition to bonus stats, Doom Bot Malzahar also:
  • Multicasts Call of the Void
  • Increases his Void Swarm with ability rank
  • Briefly charms his targets with Malefic Visions, the visions also spread faster
  • Summons a Void Swarm and creates a ZZ'Rot Portal while using Nether Grasp
Watch out for his minions! They're just little guys!

Forest of DoomIn addition to bonus stats, Doom Bot Maokai also:
  • Passively plants bushes and Saplings
  • Has a longer range Bramble Smash
  • Creates self propogating Empowered Saplings
  • Pulls enemies towards him with Nature's Grasp
Is wise and old.

Tidecaller of DoomIn addition to bonus stats, Doom Bot Nami also:
  • Has a special Aqua Prison that splits into three more bubbles
  • Blesses nearby allies with Tidecaller's Blessing
  • Makes sure that the first Tidal Wave she casts is small
She left her dinglehopper and snarfblat under the sea.
Come, minions, let us celebrate our victory! A feast of s'mores and weenies awaits!
Booohooo! It appears that you've LOST!
Oooh, that was so much fun. It's a shame the killing's DONE!
Are you crying? MMmm. Your tears are so delicious!
"And Veigar stood above his fallen foes, a wicked grin upon his face!"
You were so close... And yet so far! Next time, pray you RAISE THE BAR!
I knew that you wouldn't be able to MEASURE UP!
That's right! You never stood a chance. Now on your corpses, I will dance!
Did you learn your lesson, "campers?" Say it with me: "Don't mess with Veigar!"
I had a thought, perhaps it's mean... Hehe! We could use a change of scenery!
I send thee off to Mordey-land! One at a time, 'til no one stands!
Would a fight to the death in the death realm bring you back to life? Time to find out!
It's not a Battle Royale unless there's a crown you're fighting over! Still... it's entertaining!
In Mordey-land, there are no winners! Only losers and those that survive SLIGHTLY longer!
You simpletons, you clueless bumpkins. Try your best, destroy my pumpkins!
Go, pumpkins! Drain their lifeforce! Watch as they crumble before your great gourd-lyness!
"And Veigar spawned a plethora of pumpkins, empowered by his dark magic!"
Do you feel that? That is the POWER of my POISON PUMPKINS!
An orange fruit, perfect for pies... my pumpkins love to watch you DIE!
My power... redirected at me? IMPOSSIBLE?
OW! That hurts! ...It's only fun when I do it to you!
So that's what the darkest matter in the universe feels like? Ouch.
I don't think so! You're not the master of ME anymore!
Come back to me, my minions! I grant you one final task: destroy their base!
Through my portals, my minions go... eager to defeat my every FOE!
Sure, you defeated them before... but this time, my minions will END YOU!
"And so Veigar manifested MORE portals, bringing his minions back from the brink!"
As long as my perfectly petrifying portals stand, my waves of minions will NEVER cease!
Guess who loves a good guessing game? ME!
Which zone is safe, you'll never know! Some are real... and some are faux!
Remember which zone I've marked as safe... or you will face a SCORCHY fate!
"And so Veigar offered respite... but it would not be free. His foes must use their memory!"
Ooooo, this is a fun game! If you like narrowly escaping death and incineration... Which I DO!
It's time to bring out the big guns!
Eenie, meenie, miny, moe. Which foe will be the first to GO?
Ooooooo, this is going to be SO. MUCH. FUN!
Witness true power! Then bask in it! WORSHIP it!
You had it easy, "campers." Try this on for size!
Oh, you are all so tiny! So adorable!
Hello pipsqueaks! I will squash you like a bug!
Evil has arrived! And it's bigger and BADDER than ever!
"And so Veigar himself joined the battle! Eager to hear his foes' DEATH RATTLE!"
@PlayerAName@, prepare for a burst of PRIMORDIAL POWER!
@PlayerAName@, a name most silly. I'm sorry that I have to KILL YE!
"And Veigar discovered a camper worthy of unleashing his ultimate evil upon: @PlayerAName@!"
I have a special treat for one lucky camper: @PlayerAName@! And by "treat" I mean PRIMORDIAL PAIN!
Time for a little target practice! This one is for you, @PlayerAName@!
Not a single one of you remains. I guess all that fighting was in vain!
"And Veigar stood alone, on an empty field. His enemies fading into disgusting, dirty DUST!"
Hehe! That's right! I count 'em: five! None of you are left ALIVE!
"And so Veigar turned his sights on the Nexus. All that stood between him and TOTAL VICTORY!"
No more defenses for these "campers," so to their Nexus I will scamper!
The length of my sticky-arms does not matter! Their Nexus is within reach!
That'll teach you to go poking your head around where it doesn't belong!
"And so the overconfident hero fell, entering Veigar's base with PUNY power!"
When you step into my base, your entire SOUL I will erase!
You thought you could stroll into my home? THINK AGAIN!
"And just like that, Veigar's foe was felled!"
You just died and NO ONE cried!
Hehehe! Murder brings me such merriment!
One... two... three... four! These clones of mine you CAN'T ignore!
"And Veigar made delightfully deviant clones of himself, their purpose to protect their creator!"
Which one is me, you'll never guess. I suppose you'll have to DUEL the rest!
This fight is getting kind of bland. Off you go... to MORDEY-LAND!
Channeling the power of my ol' "pal" Mordekaiser... that's some poetic justice!
And for Veigar's next trick, he'll make you disappear into a terrifying abyssal space!
Curses! Your victory will be short-lived!
But I was so big... and you were so small! I guess size doesn't matter after all!
No! No! No! This isn't over! It can't be!
Please! Show me mercy! I would do the same for you! I SWEAR!
This is just a tiny setback! The campers will summon me again! And then you'll be sorry!
" And so Veigar faded into dust, but vowed to return, he knew he must!"
I can't be killed! As long as evil exists, I will live on! In every cold, black heart!
It's just a nightmare, Veigar. They didn't really defeat you... they COULDN'T!
You only THINK that you have won. But I'll be back to END your fun!
Your base is overrun. It belongs to me now!
Aww, is it over already? What a shame!
Your rinkydink campsite is no more! My minions got rid of that EYESORE!
If at first you don't succeed... die, DIE again!
I have nothing nice to say... That was quite a sad display!
Make haste, hehe! You have so little time to defend your world from ME!
Fear not, "campers!" Your pitiful lives will be over... shortly!
Go forth, my minions! Destroy these so-called heroes!
You dare summon me for a test of skill? What a grave error!
I am the greatest evil that has ever been and ever will be! I am Veigar!
You best be warned, and you best beware, for you are in for quite the SCARE!
You cannot comprehend the horrors I will unleash upon you!
Sticks and stones may make my bones... but you will die, scared and alone!
"And so... Veigar brought with him a small army. And the campers shrieked in fear!"
I've got something new in store for you: devious "DOOM BOTS" and calamitous CURSES.
This world could use a touch more evil! Perhaps my "DOOM BOTS" and CURSES will do the trick!
Camps have activities like crafts and canoeing. I've got "DOOM BOTS" and CURSES for my evildoing!
Experience untold power with my Golden Spatula surprise! An item guaranteed to level you up! Hehehe!
And now... My Phenomenal Evil grows even stronger! Do you DARE try to outscale me?
I won't wait around TWIDDLING my THUMBS. Only wanton death can delay my arrival!
Time is almost up! In 30 seconds... you will KNOW FEAR!
30, 29, 28... Join me in counting down YOUR DOOM!
30 seconds left! It's so close, I can taste it! And it tastes like... EVIL!
32... 31... THIRTY. Mere seconds left until you'll be HURTING!
Marshmallows and candy sour, give this minion unmatched power!
I was summoned and now I'm doing the summoning. Really makes you think!
When my arcane ritual completes, this minion shall be UNSTOPPABLE!
Get stronger, my minion! Bask in the POWER of Veigar!
Twigs from trees, rocks from the quarry. Fight this minion and you'll be sorry!
No! My minion was almost PERFECT!
"And Veigar's ritual was foiled by a meddling maniac. Still—he knew he would prevail!"
You're starting to make me very angry. BIG mistake!
"And MiniSinged broke free before Veigar's magic had taken hold. Still... he should prove useful."
Get back here, MiniSinged! I haven't finished telling you about my plans for WORLD DOMINATION!
What's small as a bug, but faster than lightning? MiniSinged, of course, a minion most frightening!
You "campers" caught MiniSinged? I guess all those games of tag paid off!
Ergh! I had hoped that all that ooze would make MiniSinged too slippery to snag!
This can't be true! You must have cheated! I never thought MiniSinged could be defeated!
Meet your most fearsome foe yet: "Camp Counselor" Karthus!
What's tall and pale and loves to sing about oblivion? Karthus, of course!
Prepare for Karthus' requiem! Your odds... not easily OVERCOME.
You killed Karthus? He said it couldn't be done!
I will not whine, nor will I fuss, even though you killed Karthus.
I will simply summon him again! The Deathsinger can NEVER DIE!
What my Mega-Ziggs minion may lack in brains, it makes up for with MUNITIONS!
"And Veigar's bomb-brigading brute made his way toward the unsuspecting campers!"
Here he comes to end this calm, a massive minion with a bouncing bomb!
No no no! Just don't blow up on me! I'm incredibly flammable!
Drat! This wasn't the explosive finale I was hoping for!
Mega-Ziggs' size made him too easy to topple... perhaps something smaller would prove unstoppable!
These minions are just a FRACTION of my power. My portals will summon a veritable army!
Watch on in abject terror, foolish mortals, as I conjure new evil from my portals!
"And so Veigar manifested three portals 'cross the campgrounds, primed to summon greater threats!"
My portals! My precious, profane PORTALS!
Oooh you'll regret putting my portal party to an end!
That wasn't very nice. That wasn't very fair. Next time you won't catch my portals UNAWARE!
Beg for help! It will never come!
You underestimated me... and now you'll face the consequences: total HUMILIATION!
"And the campers' smiles all turned to frowns!"
You have failed, it is done. Pray for mercy, you'll find NONE!
Hehehe! Another evil plan of Veigar's... successful!
The only thing more sweet than victory? Delicious, burning MARSHMALLOWS!
I almost feel sorry for you! ALMOST.
I wish you'd put up more of a fight! I LOVE a great camp competition!
If that was giving it "your all," I'd hate to see what "barely trying" looks like!
Stop scaring away my scarecrows! That's their job!
Alright, so you found one! There's plenty more where that came from!
You should be scared. Why aren't you SCARED?!
A single rhyme, a simple riddle... search the "campgrounds" for every Fiddle!
Cease this fighting! Time for levity! Play hide-and-seek with creepy efigies!
"And so Veigar summoned his petrifying pal to play hide-and-seek with his frightened foes!"
You found every effigy? But I hid them so expertly!
I must admit that was well-fought. All the effigies I hid, successfully sought.
Fiddlesticks swore he was an expert at hiding. That straw-stuffed liar!
Grizzly ghouls from every grave... seperate the foolish from the brave!
Touch those tombstones if you dare! No seriously... don't touch them! They're spawning ghouls!
"Campers" please, keep up your guard! This is a most spooky ghost-graveyard!
What a surprise! That was a twist! You'd make an excellent exorcist!
All my ghastly graves are gone? GAH!
Those spirits weren't supposed to find peace! They should have torn YOU to pieces!
Fight over the area, hold it dearly. Or you'll be punished, most severely!
My minions versus some scrappy heroes in a game of king-of-the-hill. Oooh, this'll be a BLAST!
"Veigar's lackeys battled against the enemy over a hill. And it was a glorious sight to behold!"
Just because you won "king of the hill," don't expect a crown! It's fitted for MY SIZE ONLY!
Capturing a point is child's play! Try capturing the hearts of dozens of adoring minions!
That was luck, it wasn't skill! By CHANCE you won "king of the hill!"
Weenie roasts and s'mores galore, guess I should reveal the score: @SubA@ to @SubB@!
Hmph! If this plan failed... I shall plan ANOTHER!
You will not have the last laugh! I will be me, Veigar! Hehehe!
I let you win, you will see. NEVER again will you face victory!
A primordial evil will not be bested by... such easily-spooked "campers!"
This miniscule mistake means nothing to me! NOTHING!
Don't get it wrong, let's not be chummy... it's just a friendly fight over a target dummy!
Here's a targeted challenge for you! Hurt your dummy more than we do!
I shall summon two dummies to our realm... to show you what true stuffings-for-brains looks like!
Your dummy was the first to fall... guess you are the dumbest after ALL!
Wasting all your power on target practice? I'll save mine for the fights that matter!
That damage was diabolical! That dummy'd be dead if it was ever alive to begin with!
My minions may not be random, but they are all heading mid! Match their march or SUFFER!
Don't pout and cry like a little kid! Face my minions as they march down mid!
No shield shall stall my servant's storm! Your tower WILL fall!
Fine! Your fortification withstands my mighty magic! ...For now!
You held against my mid ambush... perhaps my minions should split-push!
"And Veigar stared at the still-standing stronghold and grew angry... ANGRY!!!"
I grow BORED! A curse will cure that!
You thought it bad, but it gets worse. Here, have a fresh, new curse!
"And Veigar's claw twists, summoning a new curse upon the land!"
Head of worm, tail of snake, to cast a curse, is all it takes!
One curse is not enough to match my wrath. I cast TWO!
Call the doctors! Call the nurses! You'll need them after VEIGAR'S CURSES!
One's too few and three's too many, but TWO CURSES is just PERFECT!
Let my contemptible curse take hold! Not a single time, instead two-fold!
My minions aren't useless after all!
"And so the minions ransacked the camper's base... preparing for Veigar's assault!"
The base is gone... the perfect crime! My minions did it! Just in time!
But the glory of destroying their Nexus will be mine and mine alone. BEGONE MINIONS!
But this battle must end as it was always meant to: Veigar, alone and ALL POWERFUL!
"Veigar's minions had served their dark purpose. The Master of Evil would fight alone!"
You fools failed to fell their inhibitors, yet you stand before me? Cowards!
Ugh! What's a Master of Evil have to do to find some good help?
Minions! This was a simple, bite-sized job, and you botched it. You're fired!
If you want a job done... you have to do it yourself!
Unlike my minions, I will show NO mercy!
Well done, my minions! Their base is unprotected... and ready for DESTRUCTION!
"And with their inhibitors down, the campers quaked in fear!"
It is done, their base is no more. Now it's time to settle the score!
No more hide'n'seek, "campers!" Your inhibitors will fall and you will follow!
Their inhibitors still stand? Do your job, minions. Take them out, or face MY MOST EVIL WRATH!
Your inhibitors protect you, but no longer! We'll take them out, then WE'LL be stronger!
Curses! Their defenses will be no match... for ME!
What?! These "campers" held back my minions' march?
Nooo! My minions failed to end this war. It's up to ME to crush their inhibitors!

Titan of DoomIn addition to bonus stats, Doom Bot Nautilus also:
  • Causes his Dredge Line to be a real drag
  • Has larger Riptide range
  • Creates a large AOE knock-up with Depth Charge that tosses enemies into him
Is great under pressure.

Starchild of DoomIn addition to bonus stats, Doom Bot Soraka also:
  • Calls down multiple stars with Starcall and Wish
  • Shreds magic resist with stars
  • Casts an Equinox which creates multiple silence zones
Is the goat!

Doom Bot has gained @f4@ stacks of Adaptive Force!

Adaptive Force is currently granting {{perk_tooltip_dynamic_StatModAdaptive_@f1@}}

Yordle Gunner of DoomIn addition to bonus stats, Doom Bot Tristana also:
  • Auto attacks multiple targets
  • Applies Explosive Charge to minions when attacking
  • Knocks enemies away with Rocket Jump's landing
  • Blasts her enemies away even further with Buster Shot
Is fun and balanced.

Dreadnought of DoomIn addition to bonus stats, Doom Bot Urgot also:
  • Fires multiple Corrosive Charges in a circle
  • Purge(s) more people at a larger range
He's an uncle now. And a proud one at that.

The Monkey King of DoomIn addition to bonus stats, Doom Bot Wukong also:
  • Crushes multiple enemies with Crushing Blow
  • Creates more clones based on Nimbus Strike's rank
  • Cyclones in with more clones
Was the best. Is still the best. Will continue to BE the best.

The Magus Ascendant of DoomIn addition to bonus stats, Doom Bot Xerath also:
  • Echoes Arcanopulse when it hits a champion, re-casting the ability from another angle
  • Casts a larger Eye of Destruction and smaller follow ups when possible
  • Barrages the closest visible champion with Rite of Arcane
Just dodge his... everything and you'll be fine!
Doom-boss Veigar unleashes a bolt of dark energy that deals magic damage to the first two enemies hit. Units killed by this bolt grant Doom-boss Veigar some ability power permanently.
Doom-boss Veigar calls a great mass of dark matter to fall from the sky to the target location, dealing magic damage when it lands. Stacks of Phenomenal Evil reduce Dark Matter's cooldown.
Doom-boss Veigar twists the edges of space, creating a cage that Stuns enemies that pass through.

Doom-boss Veigar is the greatest Evil to ever strike at the hearts of Runeterra - and he's only getting bigger! Striking an enemy Champion with a spell or scoring a takedown grants Doom-boss Veigar permanently increased Ability Power.
Blasts target enemy champion, dealing a large amount of magic damage, increasing based on the target's missing health.
